title: Energy dissipated by R during variable current

content.question: A steadily increasing current in a resistor of resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given as function of time <math alttext="lowercase t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> by <math alttext="I of lowercase t, equals b times lowercase t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a constant. What is the total energy dissipated in the resistor during the time interval <math alttext="0 less than or equal to lowercase t, less than or equal to uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 b squared, times uppercase T, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>T</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half, times b squared, times uppercase T squared, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="b squared, times uppercase T squared, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third, times b squared, times uppercase T cubed, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="b squared, times uppercase T cubed, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one third, times b squared, times uppercase T cubed, times R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
